DOC.brief_title: Clinical Follow After Subtotal Total Hysterectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To evaluate ultra long-term follow-up subtotal total hysterectomy patient operate 1978-1979 Turku University Hospital , Finland . Methods : From original cohort 212 patient 193 send postal questionnaire 1997 find possible symptom related hysterectomy . Again 2011 questionnaire base evaluation possibility clinical visit study hospital do 153 patient . In first evaluation self-made questionnaire second evaluation validate questionnaire use . During follow-up visit clinical examination use also POP-Q-system do . Additionally , hospital record patient review find subsequent operation hysterectomy .
